mapper.select: SELECT userId, userPwd, userName, userNickName, membershipNum, regDate, update_Date FROM member WHERE userId = #{userId} AND memberEnable != 0

SELECT userId, userPwd, userName, userNickName, TO_CHAR(regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, TO_CHAR(update_Date,'YYYY-MM-DD') update_Date, userTel, userEmail, memberEnable, userImgSaveFileName, userImgOrigFileName, loginFail, TO_CHAR(nickUpdate_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') nickUpdate_date, TO_CHAR(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') birth FROM member WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userId, userPwd, userName, userNickName, regDate, update_Date, userTel, userEmail, memberEnable, loginFail, membershipNum, nickUpdate_date, birth) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, 1, 0, 1, SYSDATE, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM memberAddr WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT areaNum FROM area WHERE bcodeCut = #{bcodeCut}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO area (areaNum, area1, area2, area3, aLat, aLon, bcodeCut, bcodeSigungu) VALUES (#{areaNum}, #{area1},#{area2},#{area3},#{aLat},#{aLon}, #{bcodeCut, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcodeSigungu, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO memberAddr (maNum, maZip, maAddr1, maAddr2, userId, areaNum, maLat, maLon) VALUES (memberAddr_seq.NEXTVAL,#{maZip},#{maAddr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{maAddr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId},#{areaNum},#{maLat, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{maLon, jdbcType=DOUBLE})
